name: Wizard Fire
description:
This is my first game for my first game jam ever. 

It is a basic shoot-em up game where you have to shoot squares that fall down from the sky. You are a wizard who shoots fireballs and have to keep all the squares from falling below the ground.

I am still very new and I am learning as much as I can. I believe this jam was a great learning experience and I am very excited for my next one!
